meanings.sent1: The fog enveloping the town made it hard to see.
meanings.sent2: She walked slowly through the enveloping darkness of the night.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to hide in the enveloping blanket, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: The silence was like an enveloping cloak, muffling all sound.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of the enveloping sunlight was comforting on a cold day.

meanings.definition: To wrap up or cover completely
meanings.sent1: He carefully enveloping the gift in colorful wrapping paper.
meanings.sent2: The spider was enveloping its prey in silk to save for later.
meanings.sent3: The chef was enveloping the dough around the filling to make delicious dumplings.
meanings.sent4: The vines were enveloping the old house, giving it a mysterious look.
meanings.sent5: The artist was enveloping the canvas with bold strokes of paint, creating a masterpiece.
